attributes.action: Cancel all A-Level exams for the 2022 cohort due to disturbed learning
attributes.additional_details: Several groups of people will be affected if exams go ahead in the summer of 2022, therefore you must sign this petition so we are heard. We must gather signatures from teachers, students and parents so we can make a change. To get a true reflection of a students grade, an alternative method of assessment should be used which will reflect a true representation of the pupils’ grade.
attributes.background: Due to the impact of the pandemic, the cohort of 2022 has had the most disturbed learning. This year of students did not sit GCSE' and have experienced many national lockdowns where students could not receive adequate teaching and support.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597282
